description: From quick scrambles to steep pitches, high-activity pursuits on the mountain are made easier in the midweight Men's Portal Pants. Part of Marmot's M3 Softshell collection, these midlayer pants offer extreme comfort and water repellency, and get top marks for stretch, softness, and packability. Articulated knees and a gusseted inseam ensure you have the mobility you need. These climbing pants have an adjustable waist with snap closure and adjustable drawcord leg hems, so you can easily customize your fit. Stow gear in the zippered hand pockets or thigh pocket.
name: Marmot Portal Pants, Short - Mens
